sentences.en: 10 percent down and the balance at the time of shipment?
sentences.cn: 百分之十付现款,余额在装运时付清 吗 ?

sentences.en: Bananas are packed before being transported to the docks for shipment overseas.
sentences.cn: 香蕉在运到码头发往海外之前已经装箱。

sentences.en: He rode a shipment of machines in the truck on his return trip.
sentences.cn: 他开卡车回来的时候搭运了一批机器.

sentences.en: I'm afraid that this shipment was not up to your own standard.
sentences.cn: 我恐怕这批货达不到你们自己的标准.

sentences.en: In that case we can submit the entry several days after shipment.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,可以在装运后的几天内提出申报.

sentences.en: In this shipment, there is a difference of 50 tins.
Please advise the date of shipment as soon as possible.
The goods are done up in bundles for shipment.
The goods are ready for shipment.
The shipment does not check with the sample.
sentences.cn: 装船的货物与货样不符.

sentences.en: The vase was fragmented in shipment.
sentences.cn: 花瓶在运送途中被打碎了.

sentences.en: The whole shipment of cattle made the grade as prime beef.
sentences.cn: 这批牛全部达到了上等牛肉的标准.

sentences.en: There was a great deal of breakage in that shipment of glassware.
sentences.cn: 那批玻璃器皿损坏了很多.

sentences.en: These are articles ready for shipment.
sentences.cn: 这些是准备装运的货物.

sentences.en: We will do our best to advance shipment but cannot commit ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们一定尽力提前装船,但不能保证.

phrases.tran_cn: 装船通知；装运通知；船运通知
延迟装运；前批装船货物

trans.tran_cn: 装运，载货量，装货，装载的货物
trans.tran_en: a load of goods sent by sea, road, or air, or the act of sending them
